緉字的基本解释

緉
liǎng
古代计算鞋的单位，相当于“双”：履五緉。
两股绳带交合。

緉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎng］
［《廣韻》良切，上養，溪。］
［《廣韻》力讓切，去漾，來。］
古代计算鞋的量词。犹双。

緉字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緉； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页929第07
【廣韻】【正韻】良獎切【集韻】【韻會】里養切，?音兩。【說文】履兩枚也。一曰絞也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】力讓切【正韻】力仗切，?音亮。義同。

緉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
緉字的起名意思

暂无。

緉
Basic explanation of words
緉
liǎng
The unit of calculating shoes in ancient times was equivalent to "double": five shoes.
The two cords are intersected.
緉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎng］
["Guangyun" good cut, raised, stream. ]
["Guangyun" force to cut, go to Yang, come. ]
The quantifier of ancient computing shoes. Still double.
緉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緉; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 929 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Good prize cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] raise cuts, two sounds. [Said the text] I have two shoes. One said twisted.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Forced to cut [Zheng Yun] force to cut,? The sound is bright. The same meaning.
緉

Name meaning

счётное слово: пара (обуви)
